channel.title: Outdoors on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoors on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: On Falling Off the Wagon -- Reflections on Running
item.description: I got “on the wagon” in August – meaning that I’ve amped up my milage significantly, over 120 miles per month, and sometimes even over 100km per week. Two months have passed since then, and I have learned so much about my body, my own mental processes, time, dealing with expectations, past performances etc. I have a troubled relationship with running – I used to run excessively to lose weight, was borderline aneoric, had anxiety attack due to running races.
